examples.example: 这座城市规划出了一平方公里的区域用于建设大型公园，供市民休闲娱乐。

translate.english: This city has planned an area of one square kilometer for the construction of a large park for citizens to relax and have fun.

examples.example: 我们的学校占地面积达到了一平方公里，为学生提供了宽敞而优美的学习环境。

translate.english: Our school covers an area of up to one square kilometer, providing students with a spacious and beautiful learning environment.

examples.example: 我们的小镇有一平方公里的绿地，是大家放松身心的好去处。

translate.english: Our small town has one square kilometer of green space, which is a good place for everyone to relax.
